description:
Hirako Take was a Senior Class http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator] before resigning from the http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG]. In the past he formed a duo with http://anidb.net/ch70038 [Arima Kishou].
He was in charge of the 21st ward and previously investigated the S-rated ghoul http://anidb.net/ch95690 [Serpent] with http://anidb.net/ch95847 [his squad], but was later transferred to work alongside Arima again.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Hirako Take
